amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, $3,000,000 to establish the Consortium of Visualization Excellence for Underseas Warfare Modeling and Simulation (COVE).

vote.text: Amendment SA 3504 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3504 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S7375; text: CR S7375) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, $3,000,000 to establish the Consortium of Visualization Excellence for Underseas Warfare Modeling and Simulation (COVE).
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3504 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3504 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reed.
